first.text: this is Dasha with Acme Credit Union. You visited one of our offices earlier today. I'd like to ask you a few questions about the experience. Do you have two minutes now?

repeat.text: I was just saying, do you have two minutes to answer a few questions
? This will help ACME serve you better.

first.text: Perfect, thank you. First question. How would you rate the bank employees with whom you interacted? Please use the scale of 1 to 5.

repeat.text: I was saying. How would you rate the bank employees with whom you interacted. Please rate as 1 to 5.

i_will_call_back.text: Okay, I'll call you later. Bye!

when_callback.text: When can I call you back?

first.text: I'm sorry to hear your experience was less than optimal. What could have been done better?

repeat.text: I was saying. What about the experience could have gone better?

first.text: Thank you. Next question. On a scale of 1 to 5; how did you feel about the effectiveness of the anti COVID measures at the bank location?

repeat.text: I was saying. How would you rate our anti covid measures. On a scale of 1 to 5.

first.text: So sorry to hear that you thought our measures are not sufficient. What do you think can be done better?

repeat.text: I was saying. What do you feel could have been done better in terms of anti covid measures?

first.text: Thank you. And final question, how would you rate the overall experience, on a scale of 1 to 5?

repeat.text: I was saying. On a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate your overall experience?

first.text: I am so sorry to hear that you did not enjoy the experience. Can you please tell me what you feel could have been done better?

repeat.text: I was saying. What can we have done better to make your experience more pleasant?

first.text: Thank you for such a high rating of your experience. Can you please share what especially stood out?

repeat.text: I was saying. What stood out to you in making your experience this pleasant?

first.text: Thank you so much. Anything else we should make note of?

repeat.text: I was saying. Anything else we should make note of?

first.text: Thank you so much for your time and for remaining a loyal ACME customer! Your feedback will help us serve you better. Bye!

repeat.text: I was saying. Anything else we should make note of?

first.text: I'm so sorry you were unsatisfied. I will be sure to mark your feedback as escalated.

repeat.text: I was saying. What stood out to you in making your experience this pleasant?

random.text: Sorry, could you say it again?
Sorry, the connection dropped for a second. Could you say that again?
Sorry, I didn't quite catch that.
Could you say it one more time?

dont_understand_hangup.text: I'm sorry I can barely hear you. I'll try to call you later! Bye!

dont_understand_forward.text: I'm sorry, let me transfer you to another agent. Please stand by!

yes_i_am_a_robot.text: Actually I am an advanced AI. Just don't tell my boss or I'll be out of a job.

repeat_question.text: Can you repeat the question, please?
